fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The Covid-19 vaccine produced by Moderna does not require “ultra-cold” storage as an article said (Jab offers hope for poorer countries, 24 November, page 7). It can be stored at -20C, similar to the temperature of a domestic freezer, for up to six months, and at refrigerated conditions (2C to 8C) for up to 30 days. • A listing for the BBC TV show Gardeners’ World misplaced Monty Don’s Longmeadow garden in Hertfordshire; it is in Herefordshire (30 October, page 11, G2). • Other recently amended articles include: Debit card targeting millennials is ‘operating without permission’ Carlos Ghosn: UN experts tell Japan treatment of ex-Nissan boss ‘fundamentally unfair Children’s books eight times as likely to feature animal main characters as BAME people The week in wildlife – in pictures Monday briefing: PM bets on Christmas bonus Ice Bucket Challenge co-creator Patrick Quinn dies aged 37 Arts After Brexit study warns of two-year cultural hiatus in UK
